original_text: and laid it in his own new tomb, which he had cut in the rock. And he rolled a great stone to the entrance of the tomb and went away.
korean_text: 바위 속에 판 자기 새 무덤에 넣어 두고 큰 돌을 굴려 무덤 문에 놓고 가니

sentences.original_text: and laid it in his own new tomb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그것을 그의 새 무덤에 누였고

sentences.original_text: which he had cut in the rock
And he rolled a great stone to the entrance of the tomb
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 무덤 입구에 큰 돌을 굴려놓고
